title: Can I pick a hero that someone else picked?
body: If so what do I do? I really want to stick to one hero.

replies.body: You won't be able to have two of the same champion on one team. For example, you can't have two Annie's on Blue Team. It's always good to have at least one other champion you're familiar with in case your champ gets banned/taken or your role gets assigned to someone else.
